## RegisterRouteCollection type

API for Application and Seed authors to register the main .

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type RegisterRouteCollection = (routeCollection: FoundationRouteCollection, predicate?: AppRoutePredicate) => (source: unknown) => void;
```
**References:** [AppRoutePredicate](./foundation-shell.approutepredicate.md)

## Example


```ts
// src/main/main.ts
...
```
